title: Deadpool, The BFG, Don’t Breathe – 8 Hollywood movies that were unfairly ignored by Oscars 2017
text: Deadpool, The BFG, Don't… Deadpool, The BFG, Don’t Breathe – 8 Hollywood movies that were unfairly ignored by Oscars 2017 In two weeks we will come to know which movie, actor and actress will bag the most prestigious of the honours, as the Academy Awards 2017 will be held on February 26 (That is early morning February 27 By Sreeju Sudhakaran | Updated: February 15, 2017 8:20 am
